title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.28 - Town of Babylon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.28 - Town of Babylon

State Regulations
(a) Smith

Street, a town highway, between Route 110 (SH 1218) and the United Parcel

Service terminal, a distance of 0.2 mile, designated as an access highway for
special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Kean Street, a town highway, between the
AAA Trucking Corp. terminal and Edison Avenue, a distance of 0.3 mile, is
designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (c) Edison Avenue, a town
highway, between Kean Street and CR 3, Pinelawn Road/Wellwood Avenue, a
distance of 1.0 mile, is designated as an access highway for special dimension
vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the
hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (d) Dale

Street, a town highway, between the Preston Trucking Co. terminal and Edison

Avenue, a distance of 0.3 mile, is designated as an access highway for special
dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used
between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (e) Burt Drive, a town highway, between West

Jeffryn Boulevard and Grand Boulevard, a distance of 0.3 mile, is designated as
an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (f) West Jeffryn Boulevard, a town highway, between East Jeffryn Boulevard and Grand Boulevard, a distance of 0.4 mile, is
designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (g) [
Reserved
]
(h) East Jeffryn Boulevard, a town highway, between West Jeffryn Boulevard and

Grand Boulevard, a distance of 0.4 mile, is designated as an access highway for
special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (i) Carll's Path, a town highway, between the

Con-Way Eastern terminal and Grand Boulevard, a distance of 0.2 mile, is
designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (j) [
Reserved
]
(k) Straight Path, CR 2, a county road between Ralph Avenue, a town highway, and

Pinelawn Road/Wellwood Avenue (CR 3), a distance of 0.7 mile is designated as
an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (l) Ralph Avenue, a town highway between

Court Street and Straight Path (CR 2), a distance of 0.3 mile is designated as
an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (m) Court Street, a town highway, between the
truck terminal and Ralph Avenue, a distance of 0.1 mile is designated as an
access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (r) Price Parkway between Route 110 and
westerly end of Price Parkway. (s) Route 109. Route 109 between CR 3 (Wellwood Avenue) and Route 27A. (t) Route 27A. Route 27A between Route 109
and Caldor Store, West Babylon. (u) Long Island Avenue between Commack Road (CR 4) and Rodeo Drive. (w) Route 231 between Huntington/Babylon town
line and Weeks Road. (x) Weeks Road
between Route 231 and Pathmark Facility, North Babylon. (y) Route 110 between Picone Road and Route
109. (z) Route 109 between Route
110 and Wellwood Avenue. (aa)
[Eff. until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (a) below.] Acorn Street between Route 231
and Richbern Court. (aa)
[Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (a) above.] Acorn Street between Route 231 and Straight Path. (bb)

Richbern Court between Acorn Street and
its terminus. (cc)

Merritt Avenue
between Straight Path and North 28th Street. (dd)

Route 24. Route 24 between Route 110 and

Cedar Avenue. (ee)

West Industry

Court. West Industry Court between Grand Boulevard and North Industry

Court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8147.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
